resources.string: The file is not in the device

Could not open the file. Because:%1$s

Outdated version of the program, install a new Verson...

Make sure the password is correct
Can not delete the file. For the reason: %1$s
Can not delete the file %1$s. For the reason: %2$s
Something went wrong. Very, very, very wrong.
These features are experimental, and still are not entirely safe.
Select the files on your device you want to block, and selects share with Lock
You can look the advance, from a notification. And once it finished you will find the locked file.
To unlock it is just as easy.
To unlock, select share and then Lock.

This app is free, no ads and you can find the source code on github. If you think it was useful it would be good that you send some money for coffee. Donate is an the best way to contribute with new features, every little bit counts.\n Below you can find some FAQs

The short answer is yes\nBut in reality it is a little longer, in many parts of the application speaks to block because many users are not related to terms like encrypt, but what really happens is that your data encrypted using AES, the same state-of-the-art encryption algorithm used as the national standard in the United States. 1Password uses 128-bit keys for encryption, which means that it would take millions of years for a criminal to decrypt your data using a brute force attack.

Unlike other applications Lock has just one permission. It can only access external storage (SD Card) to encrypt your files. It has no access to the internet, SMS or other networks. Therefore Lock has no way to send your data out of your phone.\nFurthermore Lock code is hosted on github and who wants to can him..

Yes, If to share an encrypted image you have to open it and find the share icon in the action bar of the Lock image viewer.\n Currently this is the only way to do this, because many applications when you send images downsize so the encrypted content is lost. But we are working on improving this experience.
With Lock You can lock any file easily and securely.
